title: Refactor/rename some methods in stream.expr.StreamFactory
description: Refactors a bunch of a methods in StreamFactory to make the clearer and easier to use. Also adds documentation for public methods.

comments.author: Dennis Gove
comments.content: Mostly there. I have just a few more methods to add comments to. All relevant tests pass.

comments.author: Dennis Gove
comments.content: Added documentation for all public functions. removed the need to pass a class type to functions where only one class type was ever being passed.

comments.author: Dennis Gove
comments.content: I'm killing this. It led me down a rabbit hole that just kept going deeper and deeper and the benefits just don't outweigh the cost of completing it.
